item.description:
Join us Oct 2nd -4th for an Amazing Fall Sports & FUN Weekend/ EARLY HALLOWEEN PARTY!!!
Getaway at its most beautiful. The weather is perfect for NFL Coed Fantasy Football, hiking, biking, hay rides, pumpkin carving, apple pie baking , and the Halloween Fantasy Ball!! (Bring your costume)
http://FunMeetupGetaw... , click book now on the right , or call 917-868-4268
Join us this Weekend for a Fun weekend, Save $50 when mentioning FunMeetup by phone or typing FUN Meetup in the comment box when signing up online for the upcoming Weekend!! (plus the free drink booklet if you call and text 917-868-4268 friday night at the welcome party @the boathouse!)
http://HalloweenWeeke... or http call Greg @ 917-868-4268 if any questions!
A Vacation in a Weekend!
Vacation! The word alone makes you happy. At Getaway you can get everything you want in a vacation in one amazing, affordable weekend.
On a Getaway Vacation you'll do more in a weekend than most do all summer. Enjoy your favorite sports, activities and adventures…try something new…kick back and socialize…celebrate with great food and parties…relax and rediscover yourself. And become part of a fun-loving, adventure-seeking community.
Everything you love to do is right here waiting for you and it’s all included in one low price. Just grab a friend, a loved one or come by yourself (and meet our group, NYMeetup, JMeetup or Fun Meetup /call Greg @ 917-868-4268 to meetup the first night @ the welcome party) and make new friends everywhere you go. And it’s all right here in the beautiful Berkshire Mountains of Kent, Connecticut, only 3 hours from Boston by car
It’s the vacation you deserve, just when you need it most.

Fall Sports and Fun Oct 2-4
Club Getaway is the perfect place to be this fall. The countryside is ablaze with color. The air is cool and crisp. It's the best time of year to enjoy your favorite sports and adventures. Hiking and biking in the Berkshires. Teaming up for touch football and volleyball. Swinging out on the tennis court and dance floor. Flying through the air on the trapeze or zip line. Plus all the other Getaway activities.
In addition to all the cool Getaway stuff, our Fall Weekend is packed with special events.
The Halloween Fantasy Ball
Without a doubt, the best party of the year. We spend weeks decorating for this one. Think about your custome now. THere will be lots of prizes and surprises.
The Haunted House
Walk through the spookiest Haunted House you've ever been through...if you dare!
Autumn Hikes
The perfect time of year for hiking in New England. With hikes at all levels, you'll enjoy the countryside at its best.
Watson Scavenger Hunt
Join a team. Hunt for clues. Be the first to discover the booty! Watson Adventures brings its nationally reowned scavenger hunt to Club Getaway.
Apple Pie Baking
Our cooking class goes seasonal! Bake a beautiful apple pie to bring home to mom.
Football
What would fall be without football? Join in our co-ed touch football and let the excitement begin.
Hayrides
There's nothing quite like a hayride through the fall foilage. We've got the strumming guitars and hot apple cider.
Pumpkin Carving
This is anything but the pumpkin carving of your childhood. We've got all the pumpkins and all the tools for you to create a masterpiece!
Fall Biking
Theres nothing more beautiful than biking the Berkshires on a beautiful Autumn day. Rides for all levels.
Al Hanneman's Volleyball Clinic & Tournament
Bump, set and spike with Getaway's favorite team sports. Great clinics, tournaments and play.
Sample Schedule/ From last time / Subject to Change...
Friday Night
5:30 - 9:00 pm Welcome Arrivals Begin!
5:30 - 9:00 pm Join us for Welcome Drinks and Hors D'oeurves on the Lake Side Deck
8:00 - 9:00 pm Meet the Staff and Weekend Campers
9:00 - 10:30 pm Family Style Welcome Dinner with Free Flowing Wine in the Mountain House Dining Room
10:30 pm Join us in The Boat House Lounge for Opening Party, Champagne and Dancing with DJ Craig Cruise. Or Play Volleyball & Basketball under the Lights.

Saturday Morning
8:00 am Early Risers! Morning Coffee and Continental Breakfast
8:00 - 9:00 am Early Morning Mountain Hike

9:00 - 10:00 am Yoga with NYC's OM Yoga

9:30 pm Party at the Boat House Lounge with DJ . Dancing till the wee hours.

Sunday

Any questions, Call Greg @ 917-868-4268 !
After signing up in advance (most weekends sell out weeks in advance) call and text Greg @ 917-868-4268 to meetup at the Welcome Party Friday Night!
any questions, call Greg @ 917-868-4268, book now at http://HalloweenWeeke... (Oct. 2nd/ OUR FINALE Getaway Weekend FOR THE YEAR / if you can't make this weekend), Remember to call and text greg @ 917-868-4268 Friday Night at the welcome party/boathouse to get your FREE DRINK TICKETS (in addition to the savings you get when you book by phone/ mention FUN MEETUP or type fun meetup in the comment box if signing up online!
Join us this fall/ OCT 2nd. for an amazing weekend :)
Sports, parties, friends, laughing, dancing, and everything else, Join us for an incredible getaway!!!!
, It's a weekend you can't miss as we celebrate the end of the season!!
Any questions, call me @ 917-868-4268 !
type Fun Meetup in the comment box to save $50 or call me @ 917-868-4268 if any questions, Don't Miss the water skiing, campfire, zip line, socializing, great music, lakeside live and all the fun !
Join us Oct 2nd -4th for Fall Sports & FUN Weekend/ EARLY HALLOWEEN PARTY!!!
http://FunMeetupGetaw... click book now on the right , or call 917-868-4268
item.how_to_find_us: call & text Greg @ 917-868-4268 Friday Night @the boathouse welcome party for your free drink book (after typing or mentioning FunMeetup or Boston Meetup when booking) , meet us at the welcome party friday night at the boathouse

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org
